properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 10:48AM CST until January 13 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Sunday January 12 until Monday January 13.
* At 09 AM Saturday the stage was 8.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 16.2 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday January 12 and
continue to rise to near 16.2 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday January 13.
* At 17.0 feet...Water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
